errors.error_description: The installation steps are in the wrong order. The `[p]cog install` command is placed before the `[p]repo add` command, which will cause the installation to fail because the repo is not yet known to the bot.
correction_candidates: Swap the order of the two installation commands.
First run '[p]repo add', then run '[p]cog install'.
The '[p]repo add' command must be executed before '[p]cog install'.
Combine the commands into one: '[p]cog install from https://github.com/fixator10/Fixator10-Cogs <cog_name>'
errors.golden_answer: The '[p]repo add' command must be executed before '[p]cog install'.
